__u64 range_lock::rl_sequence

Sequence number of range lock.

This number is used to get to know the order the locks are queued; this is required for range_cancel().

Definition at line 69 of file range_lock.h.

Referenced by range_lock(), range_lock_init(), and range_unlock_cb().
